answers.answer: My blood pressure was also 130/80 and like ten minutes later it was 140/80... it has never been high always like 112/60.....is this something I should be real concerned about???

question: I am 30 weeks pregnant.. 2 days ago I was very sick, threw up all day couldn't hardly eat... and was having horrible pain.. I went to the doctor and I am doing a 24 hour urine test.. I'm sure they are testing for preeclampsia.. has anyone else been thru this? And did they make you have your baby early?
title: first time mom and scared
